statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

article.headline: Richmond holds off Saint Joseph's 63-57
article.story: PHILADELPHIA -- Kendall Anthony scored 23 including four unanswered points in the final 13 seconds Saturday to help Richmond hold off Saint Joseph's 63-57. T.J. Cline's 3-pointer with 2:34 left give the Spiders (17-12, 10-6 Atlantic 10) the lead for good at 57-54, and Trey Davis pushed it to five a minute later. Davis and Terry Allen finished with 11 points apiece. Isaiah Miles pulled Saint Joseph's (12-16, 6-10) within three and Aaron Brown added a free throw to make it 59-57. Anthony made two free throws to put Richmond back up by four and sealed it with a layup. Brown had 15 points to lead the Hawks, who went on a 6-0 run to tie the game at 54 but never led after halftime. Richmond opened the second half with a 12-4 run to lead by 14. The Hawks answered with a 15-5 run to get within 48-44 with 8:47 left.
